MathMLElementMath.summary: The <math> MathML element is the top-level MathML element, used to write a single mathematical formula. It can be placed in HTML content where flow content is permitted.

blockquote.para: Note: See the Authoring MathML page for tips to properly integrate MathML formulas in your web pages and the Examples page for more demos.

remarks.para:
-HTML top-level element: html
-SVG top-level element: svg
